contentList.content: You are descended from a divine being, granting you superior abilities.

Your abilities are increased by [1], and you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, as well as <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency</LSTag> in Constitution saving throws. Your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> is increased by [2], your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">Jump</LSTag> distance is increased by [3]%, and your carrying capacity is increased by [4]%. You gain a +[5] bonus to Initiative, and can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>.
